comments.cant_remove: You can't remove a comment that you haven't posted.
comments.cant_edit: You can't edit a comment that you haven't posted.

projects.cant_remove: You can't remove a project that you haven't created.
projects.cant_edit: You can't edit a project that you haven't created.
projects.cant_merge: You can only resolve data changes if you're a moderator or if you've created the project.

messages.login: You have to be logged in.
messages.already_flagged: You have already flagged this item.
messages.moderator: You have to be a moderator.
